Edited June 7, 2014 by likke_A_boss
OMG! those animated engines are EXACTLY what i need for my Mini ssto Spaceplane

Excellent! If you continue developing this, I have a couple requests: different size CritterCrawler bases, and a base that does not have an engine or fuel tank in it.

Anyway, thanks! This part is going to be a lot of fun.
That crawler is awesome, going to be using it a lot.
Nice but now my mun is crawling in krabs

After some testing I can say: It gets up to very high speeds if you let it run for a while! Like 20m/s and if you turn it while this happens it flips over, even if you have sticky feet on! So Baha I suggest limiting it's speed, also by the looks the legs are actually wheels, because if you let the crawler stay still it will start moving on it's own (like rolling wheels) it will even "run" up hills on it's own accord! But I don't think that is "fixable", other than that this is excellent!

Edited June 7, 2014 by Boamere

After some testing I can say: It gets up to very high speeds if you let it run for a while! Like 20m/s and if you turn it while this happens it flips over, even if you have sticky feet on! So Baha I suggest limiting it's speed, also by the looks the legs are actually wheels, because if you let the crawler stay still it will start moving on it's own (like rolling wheels) it will even "run" up hills on it's own accord! But I don't think that is "fixable", other than that this is excellent!

The appearance of wheels is because that's exactly what they are. He is using a really cool trick with the code & wheels in order to make it appear it's walking.
I love the crawler!

I believe this is my new favorite part.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I present to you the Nuclear Hedgehog. It got up to 45 m/s before it fell over. You may want to fix that

oh my gosh I nearly fell out of my chair laughing at that. Please make a video and add some appropiate music so i can roll on my floor!

Ignore the last post, i am unable to edit posts for some reason, so ill just post the corrected post here:

oh my gosh I nearly fell out of my chair laughing at that. Please make a video and add some appropiate music so i can roll on my floor!

I can confirm this thing has some serious climbing abilities!

That is near vertical! This is going to have some serious use, great mod!

This is awesome! Any chance of a hollow upper shell half? A mirror image of the shape of the bottom, but for hiding probe cores, batteries and such inside so we can make little crab balls?

I can confirm this thing has some serious climbing abilities!

That is near vertical! This is going to have some serious use, great mod!

I got it to play spiderman up the side of the VAB today, forgot to get a screenshot. will do again later.

IVE BEEN WAITING SO LONG FOR THIS

yaaaaaaaaaaaay!!!

MUST.

SCALE.

EVERYTHING!

*goes hiking on mountains with the crawler*

Can we get legitimate bigger ones? maybe some more cuboid ones with 8 legs, 2.5m? this would be perfect. I know how hard it is to animate as well as you do, so I don't expect this request to go through, but hey, just a suggestion
For some reason if you activate Sticky feet on the Mun and if you go too fast it randomly explodes into a dozen pieces.
Great work awesome mod!!!!
